text: Christophe Masson (born 6 September 1985) is a French professional road bicycle racer, who rides for UCI Continental team . He competed in the 2017 Liège–Bastogne–Liège, finishing in 124th place. Masson will retire at the end of the 2020 season, after seven years as a professional rider. ==Major results== ;2007 : 6th Overall Tour de Taiwan ;2014 : 6th UAE Cup ==References== ==External links== * Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:French male cyclists
title: Christophe Masson
